image.altText: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei

props.synopsis: The US president has called for Iran's "unconditional surrender" and warned Tehran that US patience is "wearing thin". Follow live.

image.altText: A man carries a wounded girl after an explosion in downtown Tehran

image.altText: optus 'yes' sign on glass fronted office block

props.synopsis: Optus admits to engaging in unconscionable conduct and agrees to a $100 million penalty for selling customers phones and contracts they did not want or need.

image.altText: An image of Erin Patterson.

props.synopsis: Erin Patterson's defence lawyer is continuing his closing address to the jury after eight weeks of evidence in the triple-murder trial. Follow live.

image.altText: A man's forearm focused at the interior of the elbow with a needle injected withdrawing blood.

props.synopsis: Restrictions around sexually active gay and bisexual men donating blood and plasma are being loosened in a new world-leading move by Australian Red Cross Lifeblood.

title.children: World-leading changes to sexual activity rules for blood, plasma donating

image.altText: Trump salutes while wearing red MAGA hat

title.children: As Trump contemplates Iran, he risks a MAGA meltdown

image.altText: a crude oil tanker sails away from the camera in foggy murky waters

props.synopsis: The government says "Russia uses these vessels to circumvent international sanctions and sustain its illegal and immoral war against Ukraine".

title.children: Australia hits Russia's 'deceptive' shadow fleet with sanctions

image.altText: A close-up of Jim Chalmers in front of a grey background

image.altText: A worker wearing a hard hat with the CFMEU logo emblazoned across it.

props.synopsis: Former CFMEU officials lose a High Court challenge to changes to the Fair Work Act which forced the construction arm of the union into administration.

image.altText: A man in a royal blue suit, white shirt and light blue tie sits in a room with red carpet looking toward something out of frame

title.children: Beijing's inner circle fractures as Xi's top military official disappears

image.altText: A smiling woman sits with her laughing daughter on her lap.

props.synopsis: A Sydney mother is calling for change after being told her daughter with disability would have to wait five months for a scan her doctor said was urgent.

title.children: 5yo girl with growth in ear told to wait five months for scan

image.altText: A man being led by multiple police officers into the back of a paddy wagon.

props.synopsis: The four males have been charged with multiple offences including aggravated sexual assault and sexual intercourse without consent, with two expected to appear in court on Wednesday.

image.altText: a flat triangle shaped black plane flies high over an airbase

image.altText: A large fireball rises into the sky at night as people watch on from a nearby bridge

image.altText: Two men in suits walking from the right of frame to left.

image.altText: Santos's Darwin LNG plant is seen from overhead at dusk.

image.altText: A man wearing a biege button-up shirt looks at a computer screen while seated inside.

image.altText: A woman in profile looks pensive

image.altText: A womans hands pointing at an old black and white photo in a book.

image.altText: a group walk along a country road in Western Victoria bounded by dry paddocks

image.altText: Three men wearing hi-vis and hard hats, one of them speaks at microphone

title.children: Federal government to change power price rules to push costs lower

image.altText: A young, dark-haired man in a business shirt and slacks stands outside a large building.

title.children: Charges dropped against driver involved in deadly minibus crash
